executable.title: 1 - Bias correction
executable.description: This module applies n4itk bias field correction over the input BOLD fMRI series.

integer.name: startVolSelector
integer.description: Select the first volume of the averaging frame. The first volume of the series is considered to be volume 0.
integer.label: First volume of the averaging frame:

integer.name: endVolSelector
integer.description: Select the last volume of the averaging frame. If this number exceeds the maximum number of volumes in the serie, the last volume is selected.
integer.label: Last volume of the averaging frame:

integer-vector.name: bSplineRes
integer-vector.description: Specify N4 BSpline grid resolution as a comma separated list of integers
integer-vector.label: N4 BSpline grid resolution:

integer-vector.name: numIterations
integer-vector.description: Specify N4 maximum number of iteration at each level of resolution
integer-vector.label: N4 Number of iterations:
